# SAPHanaAvailability

An alert is triggered if the HANA standalone system is not up and running. The metrics frequency is 5 seconds(default). The query window is 1m to tolerate one-off measurements. The following metrics are used in this alert:

```
workload.googleapis.com/sap/mntmode
    0 -- no maintenance; alert if system not available
    1 -- maintenance; no alert (availability of system does not matter)
workload.googleapis.com/sap/hana/availability
    3 -- system available
    <3 -- system not available
```

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch gce_instance
| { metric 'workload.googleapis.com/sap/hana/availability'
 ; metric 'workload.googleapis.com/sap/mntmode' }
| join
| window 1m
| value if(t_0.value.availability < 3 && t_1.value.mntmode == false(), false(), true())
| condition val()
